var.name: fildrho
var.info: The file containing the variation of the charge density at the q point under consideration, this file is produced by phonon.

var.name: fild0rho
var.info: The file containing the variation of the charge density at q=0, this file is produced by phonon.

var.name: fildyn
var.info: The file where the derivative of the dynamical matrix will be written

var.name: ethr_ph
var.info: Threshold for iterative diagonalization (accuracy in ryd of the calculated eigenvalues).

dimension.name: q0mode_todo
dimension.info: This array contains the list of the q=0 modes that will be computed. If q0mode_todo(1).eq.0 the program will compute every q=0 mode.
dimension.status: q0mode_todo is statically allocated to dimension 300

var.name: wraux
var.info: If .true. the program will write different terms of the matrix on different files.

var.name: istop
var.info: If this number is set different from zero the program will stop after the specified routine and will write the partial result in the recover file.
